summary: Kids are mean. Which is why kid!Tony was homeschooled to start with. Not because he couldn’t handle it, but because when Ricky...
body:
Kids are mean. Which is why kid!Tony was homeschooled to start with. Not because he couldn’t handle it, but because when Ricky Lucas called him “And-Tony Stank”, kid!Tony punched him square in the jaw.

Kindergarten were not happy.

reblog.comment:

summary: What this is saying to me is that Tony wasn't always under evil Maria's control/influence. That Tony is definitely personally...
body:
What this is saying to me is that Tony wasn’t always under evil Maria’s control/influence. That Tony is definitely personally responsible for creating an A.I. of his dead mom (and possibly his dad, tho I can see Howard being a creation of evil Maria). I thought maybe Tony made motherboard who then sort of became a version of Maria, but I don’t think that anymore.

That Tony had been avoiding Amanda and probably other important aspects of his life by using the VR world. But, Tony probably was starting to doubt what he was doing for good reasons, and maria took over him as we see.

Anyway Tony make healthy choices for fucking once challenge PLEASE

Tony Stark: Iron Man #8

summary: I'm really tired and bummed out, do you have any recommendations for super smutty or fluffy fics that don't take a lot of brain...
question: I'm really tired and bummed out, do you have any recommendations for super smutty or fluffy fics that don't take a lot of brain power? My add is acting up and I should be doing homework.
answer:
I’m right there with you, nonny. My ADD is acting up too…Other than a self-plug of my own fics, here are my favorites to reread when my brain is dead and I want to crawl into a fic:

More Fluff:

And I’d Buy A Big House Where We Both Could Live by  shinkonokokoro (59k)

Missing: Tony Stark, billionaire businessman, heir to Stark Industries, reward: none
Only Steve didn’t know that when he picked up the waterlogged unconscious man from the bank of a river.

Steve Rogers Is A Child by LagLemon (290k)

Tony gets into fights with Steve all the time and it’s driving him insane. Sure, he’s not the nicest guy in the world, but all he did was steal a little of the guy’s sesame seed bagel - he didn’t deserve to get yelled at for something stupid like that.
After drowning his sorrows in hot chocolate and complaining to Pepper about what happened, Tony gets a phone call from Natasha telling him to hurry back home. Something’s happened - Steve has been attacked and he’s not quite the same man he once was - he’s been turned into a child.
With Steve out of commission, the team struggles with what to do and Tony finds himself filling roles he had never expected: babysitter and friend.

More Smut:

snow.txt by Sineala (4k)

When Tony was a kid, he wrote massive self-insert Invaders hurt/comfort epics in which Captain America rescued him a lot. And cuddled him. He wasn’t expecting that Steve would ever, ever read them.

Attachment by Sineala (19k – sequel to snow.txt)

Tony tries to scare Steve away with his kinkiest old works of fanfiction about the two of them together. Steve refuses to be frightened.

title: Preview: Loki enslaved in space
body:
Little preview of the fic that’s percolating away in the background:

The deck boss snarled at him, “Clean yourself up, slave. You better be presentable before I come back.” A bundle of cloth was shoved into his arms and he was pushed toward the cleaning pods. The pods were in the open in the center of the deck and usually restricted to once per week. Loki was used to the lack of privacy by now, he pulled off his tunic and set it, and the new clothes on the rack. Naked, watched with idle curiosity but the inhabitants of the other cages, he stepped into the pod, raised his arms and gripped the levers to activate it. He took a deep breath and closed his eyes as the jets scoured him from top to bottom, followed in short order by blasts of air and a suction device to recover as much precious moisture as possible. 40 seconds later, he was done. Clean, or as clean as he was likely to get. He combed his hair through with his fingers and exited the pod.

Loki was nothing if not adaptable. He had lived a long life, and fully intended to keep living it, This was a temporary situation and while it was inconvenient to be held captive on this vessel, treated as a slave, used for any purpose the crew might wish, he could honestly say he had been through worse. He may be ill-treated, but he was hardly tortured, or at least, not frequently or with any skill. There were a few crew-members who liked to hear him scream, but he screamed well enough to please them and they were usually done with him after just a few hours of gratification.

If he could get close enough to feel even the faintest touch of Yggdrasil’s power, he would be up and gone before anyone even knew. Trouble was, he did not know where he was, or in which direction Yggdrasil and the nine realms lay. He had been picked up from the wreck of the Statesman and it had been days before he had his wits about him to even realize he was still alive. By that time, they were light-years away, he had already been fitted with the spinal implants these slavers used to control their cargo. Inconvenient. Nothing more.
body_abstract: Little preview of the fic that’s percolating away in the background:

summary: Ok, I’m sorry for the horrible image quality, but... I was watching the Super Bowl trailer again, and I noticed that there is a...
caption: Ok, I’m sorry for the horrible image quality, but… I was watching the Super Bowl trailer again, and I noticed that there is a red glint on the last person’s chest, almost like some kind of arc reactor. Furthermore, it looks to me like there are two people walking together. While I think it’s much more likely that the last person is just Rhodes, the extra bulk being part of his suit, and his arc reactor being a little bit more red than Tony’s, it’d be really great if that were say… Tony and Rhodes.

summary: “I could have saved them.” my poem
caption:
“I could have saved them.”

my poem

tags: this is yucky but have it anyway
summary: Have this sad lil WinterIron drabble
body:
Have this sad lil WinterIron drabble

I dreamt about him again. Those crystalline blues seem to haunt me. I can’t even escape them in sleep anymore.

I want to scream and rant and cry to anyone who will listen. No one’s here to listen though, not like they would willingly even if they were. They left. They left and now I’m alone in this place. I suppose on some level I never had them anyway, they never cared. He cared though.

He cared and I killed him. The only man who understood. The only one who cared. I loved him and I ended him.

They told me it wasn’t my fault, that it was my life or his and anyone would’ve made the choice I did, yet they still left. Their actions betrayed their words, confirming what I already knew within myself. It was my fault. I had his heart in my palm, felt it constrict for the last time. I suppose that’s only fair. He took my heart with him as he took his last breath.

summary:
I wish someone looked at me the way Steve and Tony look at each other in Avengers Assemble. 
Like
And also the way they are...
body:
I wish someone looked at me the way Steve and Tony look at each other in Avengers Assemble. 

Like

And also the way they are fooling around in Super Adaptoid episode. They are so obviously in love I think I’m gonna scream 

_________________________

….and this scene. They are walking down the corridor together. Tony is drying his hair with a towel. This means he’s just taken a shower. 

And I have questions 

Did they bump into each other in the corridor? Was Steve waiting for Tony? Was he in the shower with him? 

Before this scene, there was a frame with Stark Tower and the night city on the background. So, it’s evening. They are going somewhere in the evening. After Tony (or both of them) took a shower. Where are they going? Some “training” was mentioned, but who trains after they took a shower and washed their hair? What kind of “training” is that? I tell you these two sleep together. 

I’ve only watched a few episodes of Season 1, but I still haven’t seen Steve’s room. While Clint’s, Hulk’s, Thor’s and Falcon’s rooms were shown. You know why? You know why.

blog.name: fuckyeahdarcylewis
blog.title: FYDL
blog.description: “Fuck Yeah Darcy Lewis”, a blog dedicated to the character of Darcy Lewis, assistant of Dr Jane Foster seen in the movie Thor and its sequel and portrayed by the actress Kat Dennings. This is a MCU blog and a multi shipper blog. Here you will find fanfictions, edits, gifs and fanarts of this character. I track #darcy lewis and #fuckyeahdarcylewis This is a sideblog, I cannot follow back.

blog.name: doctornineandthreequarters
blog.title: Trapped in the moment, ready to fly.
blog.description: Jaime, 26, she/her. I'm here to reblog the things I like and rant about the weirdness of the world. Join me on my strange journey. Ao3: doctornineandthreequarters

summary: 5 Times Peter Had A Panic Attack - Chapter 5 - doctornineandthreequarters - Spider-Man: Homecoming (2017) [Archive of Our Own]
title: 5 Times Peter Had A Panic Attack - Chapter 5 - doctornineandthreequarters - Spider-Man: Homecoming (2017) [Archive of Our Own]
excerpt: An Archive of Our Own, a project of the Organization for Transformative Works
description:
New chapter!

Peter’s ears were starting to burn from the noise. He grimaced, not that anyone noticed. He gripped his hands into fists under the table, trying to stop his body from shaking. He could not be having a panic attack, not right now.

blog.name: hikage101
blog.title: Always Obsessed
blog.description: Too many fandoms, not enough space.

summary: Thank You For Calling Tech Support - Hikage101 - Marvel [Archive of Our Own]
title: Thank You For Calling Tech Support - Hikage101 - Marvel [Archive of Our Own]
excerpt: An Archive of Our Own, a project of the Organization for Transformative Works
description:
Here’s a piece I wrote not long after Captain America: Civil War. Because Stony feels. I was not happy, so I needed them to be happy. I also wrote another one at the same time, called, “It’s Always and Only Been You.” It took a long time to get the nerve to put them up. A looooong time. But I really needed them up before Endgame comes out. Pretty sure I’m gonna be living in the Great State of Denial after that one.

Anyhow, I hope you enjoy! Please check them both out! They’re not connected other than being written at the same time. There’s also a third one that I wrote a few months back. I’m working on more.

Anyhow, I hope you enjoy! Please check them both out! They’re not connected other than being written at the same time. There’s also a third one that I wrote a few months back. I’m working on more.

blog.name: abrunettefangirlnerd
blog.title: Fandoms Unite!
blog.description: Opportunity to read what the writers missed.

summary:
(Un)Broken
Plot: You and Steve were engaged before the Accords but he left you without a goodbye. Can your heart heal and open...
body:
(Un)Broken

Plot: You and Steve were engaged before the Accords but he left you without a goodbye. Can your heart heal and open up to someone new? Or are you to love Rogers the rest of your life?

Pairing: Steve Rogers x reader, Tony X reader

Part: 2/9

A Year Ago…

On your way to the living room you hear Tony’s voice mixed with Nat’s. Rolling your eyes you huff out in frustration. You wanted to have the living room to yourself and boyfriend to watch F.R.I.E.N.D.S. which is what you’ve always done after having a rough day.

“Hey why are you standing in the hall?” Steve’s voice appears behind you. “I thought we were going to watch that show of yours.”

“Yeah, we are. I’m just debating on if I should put chocolate in the popcorn.” You lie.

             Giving you a weird look for your taste in junk food he places a kiss on your forehead and proceeds to the living room. You assume your original position and try to hear what Tony says to Steve, that will help you determine what sort of mood he is in.

             Unfortunately the voices remain muffled, not allowing you a clear cut image of his mood. Taking the chance, you take a deep breath and head toward the living room.

“How’s it going, Tony?” Steve’s voice suddenly appears clearer.

“I have this headache that comes and goes.” You see Tony run his hand through his hair as you enter the room.

“There it is again.” He says glancing your way.

             You see Steve’s jaw tighten as he shoots you a sideways glance. Shaking your head you tell him not to start anything. Expelling a silent aggravated huff you plaster a smile to your face and try to be the bigger person.

              A few hours later you are curled up with Steve in his bed. Drawing patterns on your thighs you can practically feel Steve’s thoughts running around you.

“Just say what is on your mind, Steve.”

             The patterns stop and you feel him sit up behind you. Following suit, you turn to face him. Waiting for him to start you watch his mind search for a way to begin, sometimes he’s not always good with words.

“I just don’t understand why you’ve been taking his crap lately.” His hands fly up and one lands on your knee. “Why did you shake your head at me?”

“Because I want to stop driving a wedge between the team.” I take his hand in mine. “Steve we have had so many close call missions because you, or others, are distracted because of me and Tony. He just hates me and that’s that.”

******

Present Time

You slowly enter the living room with a bowl of popcorn. Noticing that no one else is around, you sit on the couch and curl up under a blanket. Turning on the tv you switch it over to Netflix and scroll through your list. Nothing you see sounds good so you end up clicking on F.R.I.E.N.D.S., start it from the beginning, and hope it is enough to distract you from today.

“Hey, (Y/N).” Tony’s voice makes you jump. “I thought you usually watched this when you are feeling down.”

“How do you know that?” You catch your jaw in astonishment. The only other person that you thought knew was Steve.

“Aside from the fact that we have technically lived together for five years?” He moves a bit closer. “I actually pay attention.”

             Not knowing how to feel about it, you invite Tony to watch a few episodes with you. After some convincing he takes a seat on the other side of the couch. Pressing the play button you try to focus on the show, but strangely you find yourself distracted.

             Shooting a side glance in Tony’s direction you see his eyes trained on the tv. You wonder why everything feels so weird. Before you wouldn’t have cared that he was around. Now something is different, you are very aware of the distance between you two and a part of you wants him to be the one looking at you.

             As if reading your mind his eyes flicker to yours and you instantly redirect your attention to the screen. Feeling slight eye whiplash, you curse yourself for staring. Waiting for him to say something you feel your stomach start to twist.

“(Y/N)?”

             Tony reaches for the remote to turn down the volume. His eyes find yours and do not waiver as he props his body to face yours. Putting his feet up on the couch, you notice he places them next to yours and you feel your lungs freeze.

“What’s wrong?” Your confused expression attempts to counteract his question. “(Y/N) you’re watching F.R.I.E.N.D.S.” He has progressively leaned in. “So I will repeat my question. What is wrong?”

“It’s just…” you trail off. This wasn’t something you felt like you could tell Tony, even though you feel like something’s changed. “Today was supposed to be my wedding day.”

“Oh,” the answer catches him off guard. Lately you two have been living in your own bubble outside of time. Vision and Rhodey still live here but they haven’t been around.

“I’m sorry,” you say trying to not get upset. “I know you probably don’t like me talking about him.”

             The plan today was to watch tv, or really do anything that wasn’t going to let you think about the wedding. But you know that idea flew out the window by the tears that are now streaming down your cheeks. Covering up part of your face with the blanket you pray you magically had the sudden power to become invisible.

             Not saying a word Tony comes and lays next to you. His body on the outside of couch, you’re sandwiched in between his body and the back cushions. Feeling a shield protect you from the outside world you allow yourself to silently cry as Tony holds you once again.

< Previous    Next >

Taglist: @vesta-ro @drabby-abby @sweatyfurystudent @lilulo-12 @ktcat88mph @mustbeaweasleyginger @animegirlgeeky @riverdalehoeeeeeee

trail.content:
(Un)Broken

Plot: You and Steve were engaged before the Accords but he left you without a goodbye. Can your heart heal and open up to someone new? Or are you to love Rogers the rest of your life?

Pairing: Steve Rogers x reader, Tony X reader

Part: 2/9

A Year Ago…

On your way to the living room you hear Tony’s voice mixed with Nat’s. Rolling your eyes you huff out in frustration. You wanted to have the living room to yourself and boyfriend to watch F.R.I.E.N.D.S. which is what you’ve always done after having a rough day.

“Hey why are you standing in the hall?” Steve’s voice appears behind you. “I thought we were going to watch that show of yours.”

“Yeah, we are. I’m just debating on if I should put chocolate in the popcorn.” You lie.

             Giving you a weird look for your taste in junk food he places a kiss on your forehead and proceeds to the living room. You assume your original position and try to hear what Tony says to Steve, that will help you determine what sort of mood he is in.

             Unfortunately the voices remain muffled, not allowing you a clear cut image of his mood. Taking the chance, you take a deep breath and head toward the living room.

“How’s it going, Tony?” Steve’s voice suddenly appears clearer.

“I have this headache that comes and goes.” You see Tony run his hand through his hair as you enter the room.

“There it is again.” He says glancing your way.

             You see Steve’s jaw tighten as he shoots you a sideways glance. Shaking your head you tell him not to start anything. Expelling a silent aggravated huff you plaster a smile to your face and try to be the bigger person.

              A few hours later you are curled up with Steve in his bed. Drawing patterns on your thighs you can practically feel Steve’s thoughts running around you.

“Just say what is on your mind, Steve.”

             The patterns stop and you feel him sit up behind you. Following suit, you turn to face him. Waiting for him to start you watch his mind search for a way to begin, sometimes he’s not always good with words.

“I just don’t understand why you’ve been taking his crap lately.” His hands fly up and one lands on your knee. “Why did you shake your head at me?”

“Because I want to stop driving a wedge between the team.” I take his hand in mine. “Steve we have had so many close call missions because you, or others, are distracted because of me and Tony. He just hates me and that’s that.”

******

Present Time

You slowly enter the living room with a bowl of popcorn. Noticing that no one else is around, you sit on the couch and curl up under a blanket. Turning on the tv you switch it over to Netflix and scroll through your list. Nothing you see sounds good so you end up clicking on F.R.I.E.N.D.S., start it from the beginning, and hope it is enough to distract you from today.

“Hey, (Y/N).” Tony’s voice makes you jump. “I thought you usually watched this when you are feeling down.”

“How do you know that?” You catch your jaw in astonishment. The only other person that you thought knew was Steve.

“Aside from the fact that we have technically lived together for five years?” He moves a bit closer. “I actually pay attention.”

             Not knowing how to feel about it, you invite Tony to watch a few episodes with you. After some convincing he takes a seat on the other side of the couch. Pressing the play button you try to focus on the show, but strangely you find yourself distracted.

             Shooting a side glance in Tony’s direction you see his eyes trained on the tv. You wonder why everything feels so weird. Before you wouldn’t have cared that he was around. Now something is different, you are very aware of the distance between you two and a part of you wants him to be the one looking at you.

             As if reading your mind his eyes flicker to yours and you instantly redirect your attention to the screen. Feeling slight eye whiplash, you curse yourself for staring. Waiting for him to say something you feel your stomach start to twist.

“(Y/N)?”

             Tony reaches for the remote to turn down the volume. His eyes find yours and do not waiver as he props his body to face yours. Putting his feet up on the couch, you notice he places them next to yours and you feel your lungs freeze.

“What’s wrong?” Your confused expression attempts to counteract his question. “(Y/N) you’re watching F.R.I.E.N.D.S.” He has progressively leaned in. “So I will repeat my question. What is wrong?”

“It’s just…” you trail off. This wasn’t something you felt like you could tell Tony, even though you feel like something’s changed. “Today was supposed to be my wedding day.”

“Oh,” the answer catches him off guard. Lately you two have been living in your own bubble outside of time. Vision and Rhodey still live here but they haven’t been around.

“I’m sorry,” you say trying to not get upset. “I know you probably don’t like me talking about him.”

             The plan today was to watch tv, or really do anything that wasn’t going to let you think about the wedding. But you know that idea flew out the window by the tears that are now streaming down your cheeks. Covering up part of your face with the blanket you pray you magically had the sudden power to become invisible.

             Not saying a word Tony comes and lays next to you. His body on the outside of couch, you’re sandwiched in between his body and the back cushions. Feeling a shield protect you from the outside world you allow yourself to silently cry as Tony holds you once again.

< Previous    Next >
